UPDATE_ON_EDIT_HELP1: When editing the dayfile and log file values via the dashboard, also update the corresponding MySQL values
BUFFER_ON_ERROR_HELP1: On a MySQL command failure, buffer the failed command(s) until Cumulus can reconnect to the MySQL server
BUFFER_ON_ERROR_HELP2: The buffer of failed commands will be lost if you restart Cumulus
RETENTION_HELP: The number of 'units' to retain in your table
UNIT_HELP1: The unit to use with the value above
LIMIT_INSERTS_LABEL: Limit real time table inserts to once a minute
LIMIT_INSERTS_HELP1: Setting this means that if your real time interval is less than one minute, then a new row will only be inserted once a minute
LIMIT_INSERTS_HELP2: You should not enable this option if your real time interval is greater than one minute
CUST_SECS_HELP1: A custom SQL command to be executed at an interval in seconds - can include webtag
CUST_HELP2: For the logging date & time, use the web tag <#DataDateTime>
CATCH_UP_HELP1: Fill in historic data on catch up
CUST_ROLLOVER_HELP1: A custom SQL command to be executed just before end of day rollover - can include webtags
CUST_TIMED_HELP1: A custom SQL command to be executed at a set time of day - can include webtags, and can be repeated at intervals
CUST_START_HELP1: A custom SQL command to be executed when Cumulus starts up
